Evaluation_Questions: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of <u>intellectual challenge</u> of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the <u>workload</u> of this course was:
Comments_Questions: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
Comments_List: I vastly improved my Spanish speaking skills and learned a good deal about communication. I now feel confident enough in my skills to navigate a Spanish speaking environment.
I learned how to better speak, read, and understand the Spanish language
Learning to speak Spanish to a greater extent, including more grammatical structures and learning to talk about topics that interest me (eg the environment)
This course is well structured to help students learn and grow in written and oral Spanish communication.
A strength to this course is that it meets every day, thus the repetition of the language in instilled in the students.

There is a big focus on speaking which is helpful. A weakness of the course is that it moves through material very fast, sometimes at a pace at which it is difficult to incorporate what you have learned into speech because not very much time is spent on in. There is also a large amount of time spent on texts which are far too difficult for the course level.

The strength of this course is that you have class every day and so are consistently building on and practising your Spanish.  However, there is a quite a lot of homework (some weeks more than others).
I would recommend this course to other students because it is an excellent way to continue Spanish learning.
Yes. If you do the work and attend class, you will learn a lot and you will be able to achieve a good grade.
If you want to learn more Spanish, then do take this course!
